Description: Call the add service.

Description: Call the delete service.

Description: Prompt message.

Description: Call the search service.

Description: Add user information according to name, mobile and address.
doAdd(User) - 接口 com.hit.myapp.infomanage.dao.IUserDao 中的方法
Description: Add user information according to name, mobile and address.
doAdd(String, String, String) - 类 com.hit.myapp.infomanage.service.UserService 中的方法
Description: Provide add service according to name, mobile and address, return whether operation is successful.
doDel(String, String) - 类 com.hit.myapp.infomanage.dao.impl.UserDaoImpl 中的方法
Description: Delete user information according to name or mobile or address, return the number of user deleted.

Description: Delete user information according to address through function doDel(), return the number of user deleted.

Description: Delete user information according to address, return the number of user deleted.
doDelByAddress(String) - 类 com.hit.myapp.infomanage.service.UserService 中的方法
Description: Provide delete service according to address, return the number of data deleted .

doDelByMobile(String) - 类 com.hit.myapp.infomanage.service.UserService 中的方法
Description: Provide delete service according to mobile, return the number of data deleted .
